dmca.title: [EV1-C2105017W] Notice of Infringing Activity

        ---- ----------------------
-------------------------------------------------- 
        1.61 DEAR_SOMETHING         BODY: Contains 'Dear (something)' 
        1.05 BSF_RULE_7582B         BODY: Custom Rule 7582B 
Return-Path: lava@1c.ru
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Dec 2006 15:06:50.0017 (UTC)
FILETIME=[FBE8F910:01C71D35] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir or Madam 
 
1C Company hereby notifies you that it has received information from
which it has a good faith basis to believe that users of service
http://www.buhinfo.com/, which appear to be administered by your
company's personnel, via links mentioned below are offering infringing
material or are engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to
copyrighted material for which 1C Company owns the copyright. 
  
Infringing materials were found at the following locations: 
http://www.buhinfo.com/file1C.php  
 
Statement of authority
1C copyrighted materials were made available from mentioned above
locations without authorization from the copyright owner or its agent. 
1C Company hereby gives a notice of these activities to you and requests
that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to
materials described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction
and distribution of these copyrighted materials via your company's
network. 
We request an immediate takedown of this links. 
The information in this notification is accurate. Please inform us what
action you take. 
   
   
 Sincerely,
 Anna Lavrinova,
 Lawyer
 1C Company 
   
 51, Malaya Gruzinskaya str., Moscow, 123056 box 64, Russia
 Tel.: +7(495) 681 73-81, fax: +7(495)681-78-08
 E-mail: lava@1c.ru
